name: Weeknight Supreme
description: A quick easy-to-make pizza with Pepperoni, Sausage, Green Peppers, and Onions

toppings: ~2 oz Pepperoni (Feel free to adjust the quantity of pepperoni based on how much you want)

instructions: Prepare the Easy Supermarket Dough as per it's recipe but split the dough in half before the final rest.
Preheat your oven as high as it can go (500-550) for at least 30 minutes (usually I do 45 minutes).
While the oven is preheating prepare the Easy Tinned Tomato Sauce as per the recipe.
Once the oven is preheated work each doughball by gently stretching it out via your desired method and place on your pizza peel or cooking pan.
Once the crust is parbaked turn on your broiler.
Ladle your tomato sauce onto the crust and spread it out working from the outside in towards the center of the pizza.
Spread the Mozzarella & Cheddar Blend cheese around the sauce in a thin layer.
Spread half of each topping around the pizza.
Pop the pizza into the oven and bake for about 5-7 minutes or until the cheese on the pizza is starting to turn a golden brown.
Pull the pizza out of the oven, sprinkle on the grated pecorino, slice, and serve!
Repeat the steps above for the second doughball.
notes: Keep the toppings light since this recipe makes a thin pizza
